column4: what on earth does this mean Extract the tarball and go to the scripts folder and in a terminal  execute this 2 scripts as root (you can use “sudo su” before to avoid  writing sudo before each line):

i want a step help not 3 steps together and not knowing what on earth to do
it means to unpack the file somewhere (tarball is like a zip), then open the terminal and go to somewhere and then install with this su sudo stuff
